story: As a User. Want to export data.
As a Manager I review reports they are approved by Finance and we ship orders
As a Nurse, I review lab results, I notify physicians when values are critical.
As a Reader, I want to save articles, so that I can find them later (at any time.
As a Librarian, I want to seach for books by title or author, so that I can assist patrons.
As a Customer, I want to reset my password, so that I can regain access to my account.
As Operators, we want to verify each batch before shipping, so that we reduce errors.
As admins, we need to review flagged posts.
